full_text: Page 1643 Inmate Epstein #76318-054 From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/01 13:33 Subject: Inmate Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Lt. [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) He said his cellmate is up all night talking which keeps him awake. When I offered to request a new cellmate for him, he stated he will try staying with his current cellmate 3 to 4 more days and will let staff know if it is getting too difficult. Thanks, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Page 8270 DOJ-OGR-00025693

text_blocks.content: Inmate Epstein #76318-054 From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/01 13:33 Subject: Inmate Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm

He said his cellmate is up all night talking which keeps him awake. When I offered to request a new cellmate for him, he stated he will try staying with his current cellmate 3 to 4 more days and will let staff know if it is getting too difficult.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)].
